qas.question: Sally puts her marble in a basket and leaves. Anne moves the marble to a box while Sally is gone. When Sally returns, where will she look for the marble first?
Maya puts her doll in a pink box and leaves. Eli moves it to a blue box. When Maya comes back, where will she look first?
Liam puts his truck in a basket and leaves. It is moved to a shelf. When Liam returns, where will he look first?
Emma puts her book in a bag and leaves. It is moved to a drawer. When she comes back, where will she look first?
Jack puts his marble in a cup and leaves. It is moved to a bowl. When Jack returns, where will he look first?
Ava puts her sticker in a box and leaves. It is moved to a backpack. When Ava returns, where will she look first?
Noah puts his ball in a drawer and leaves. It is moved to a bin. When Noah returns, where will he look first?
Olivia puts her ring in a purse and leaves. It is moved to a pocket. When Olivia returns, where will she look first?
Ethan puts his toy in a chest and leaves. It is moved to a closet. When Ethan returns, where will he look first?
Sophia puts her hat in a basket and leaves. It is moved to a chair. When Sophia returns, where will she look first?
Mason puts his toy in a box and leaves. It is moved to a shelf. When Mason returns, where will he look first?
